price: 17. Мре liboso na bango, tomekaki bato ya falo, mpe motindami ya malamu ayelaki bango.
arabic: ۞ وَلَقَدۡ فَتَنَّا قَبۡلَهُمۡ قَوۡمَ فِرۡعَوۡنَ وَجَآءَهُمۡ رَسُولٞ كَرِيمٌ

version.title: Lingala translation
version.description: Translation of the meanings of the Noble Qur’an into the Lingala language, translated by Zakaria Muhammad Balngogo.

meta.transliteration: walaqad fatannā qablahum qawma fir'ʿawna wajāahum rasūlun karīmun
